Upcoming books: Like I said, I'll keep writin' 'em. Colophon: All the rest. Bridget Read's 'Little Bosses Everywhere' (permalink) Pyramid schemes are as American as apple pie. If you doubt it, just read Little Bosses Everywhere, Bridget Read's deeply researched, horrifying, amazing investigative book on the subject, which is out today from Crown: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/715421/little-bosses-everywhere-by-bridget-read/ Read, an investigative journalist at Curbed, takes us through the history of the "industry," which evolved out of Depression-era snake oil salesmen, Tupperware parties, and magical thinking cults built around books like Think and Grow Rich.
